extendedInfo.description: Is your man on the Down Low? Do you want proof that he is doing wrong? Well, here is your chance to get that proof! Download the "Down Low Locator App" today! Then you can be sure of what you THINK is true..... Track your partner anywhere they go! Using GPS satellite technology you can locate anyone by tracking their mobile phone. Simply enter their number below and press track.Supported carriers: Sprint, Alltel, AT&T, T-Mobile, U.S. Cellular, Virgin Mobile USA.
